metadata.title: CVE-2019-10155 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The Libreswan Project has found a vulnerability in the processing of IKEv1 informational exchange packets which are encrypted and integrity protected using the established IKE SA encryption and integrity keys, but as a receiver, the integrity check value was not verified. This issue affects versions before 3.29.

criterions.comment: libreswan package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.27-6').
